title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:
Good afternoon, this mac only installs up to Catalina, when I try to install Big Sur it shows an error "Download another version and update again", but this installer works normally. 

PP3v3_SuS when I force it to shut down it falls to 0V.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message: Did you try to upgrade actual macOS, from Apple Store?

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:
And fails the upgrade from catalina to Big Sur?
Try clean ME, just in case.
Also fix Fsys checksum.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:
Fsys is okay. I have already cleaned the Me region.
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 73125, member: 682"]
And fails the upgrade from catalina to Big Sur?
[/QUOTE]
Yes.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:
"Fsys is okay"
Do you mean is fixed with Medusa?

If ME cleaned too, then try anorher known good BIOS, clean ME of course.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:
To clean the ME region I used the CH341a and the INTEL ME INJECTOR.

UEFITOOL NE 57 to check the validation of the Fsys region.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message: is a mac 2015, can you tell me if Bios mac 2017 works on the 2015 ?

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 73160, member: 682"]
Many files already posted on the forum.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message:
Try to install Big Sur in the same SSD, but in other machine.
If succed, put back that SSD and lets see what happens.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message: At first, the SSD already had Big Sur. The system boots up normally. The issue is that it won't let you install Big Sur from the installer.

title: 820-00165 no install macOS Big Sur
message: I can't read the Bios from the J6100 connector, so I removed it, to take the chance that it is interfering.
